Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: jenn allen
Reviews.Content: This laptop is horrible......Took over 3 minutes just to open up the internet then after it opened wouldnt open any other website.  Stay away from this computer.

Reviews.Title: Absolute garbage!
Reviews.Author: shade
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money!  This computer is so slow it is rendered basically useless.  It might make a good exhibit in a computer museum of totally outdated garbage.

Reviews.Title: Old system
Reviews.Author: Jon Mcgrody
Reviews.Content: Ended up returning this laptop because it used Vista. Laptop was bulkier than I expected. I decided to return it.

Reviews.Title: Old computer
Reviews.Author: JEM
Reviews.Content: Used/refurb/old computer advertised as new.  Purchased in 2012 and found out it was a 2006 computer.  Company was slow in responding to e-mails regard returning it.
